title: Lesbian Cow
author: Lesbian Cow
content: Hello Everyone!Up for auction I have  a lot of 4 x Satori Chips.  Post fork.Click any photo to make bigger.   Auction Terms:Bid Format:   Bids only in BTC. Starting Bid:  0 BTCMinimum Bid Increments:  0.0002Auction Ends:  Thursday, 27 April 2023 @ 1900 New YorkSniping:  No, each bid in the final 15 minutes adds 15 minutes until no bid has been made for 15 minutes.  If the auction has multiple lots, this applies to each lot independently.  For example, a bid on lot 1 only extends lot 1.Excluded from Bidding:   I may exclude/disqualify bidders, or require a deposit, for any bidders at my sole discretion.  If you are a brand new account, or have issues in your trust feedback, please PM prior to bidding.  Forum downtime:  If the forum goes offline in the final 4 hours of the auction I may extend the auction at my discretionShipping:  At cost in addition to the winning bid.  Ships from USA.  Buyer responsible for any local customs/duties.Payment in BTC, ETH, or USDC (ERC20)Payment address will be supplied to the winner via PM.  Make sure you are communicating with me, profile ID 206143, legendary rank, and dark green trust.Let me know if you have any questions.

comments.author: ChiBitCTy
comments.body: .01BTC(Per usual, escrow w/ transvestitelamb. Gotta be difficult for a trans lamb atm, but I supports your trans livestock drag shows)
